5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Abdullah bin Sa’ib said:“I attended the ‘Eid prayer with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ). He led us in offering the ‘Eid prayer, then he said: ‘I have finished the prayer. Whoever wants to sit (and listen to) the sermon, then let him sit, and whoever wants to leave, then let him leave.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي انْتِظَارِ الْخُطْبَةِ بَعْدَ الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning waiting for the sermon after the Prayer
